projects.name: Lords of Uberdark - 3D Voxel Based Mining / Building Game
projects.blurb: Lords of Uberdark is a 3D voxel-based mining and building game with smooth geometry and cartoon-style graphics.

projects.name: Octodad 2
projects.blurb: A computer game about the life of an octopus trying to pass himself off as a [human] suburban father.

projects.name: Imagine Me
projects.blurb: An indie game about saving a little boy by creating worlds and connecting with his memories.

projects.name: Dashkin: a game of high speed challenges through Brackenwood
projects.blurb: Free to play, "Dashkin" is a high-speed game based on the award-winning Brackenwood series of Flash movies by Adam Phillips.

projects.name: Fara: A New Action RPG
projects.blurb: An action RPG for the iPhone/iPod touch featuring innovative physics, fast paced combat, and a quirky story in a hand painted world

projects.name: Blade Symphony
projects.blurb: Blade Symphony is a multiplayer sword-fighting game, with breathtaking visuals and heart-pounding gameplay, from the makers of Dystopia

projects.name: Paper Dinosaurs Crazy Dino Player Video Game
projects.blurb: Full of colorful animation and music, you make your Paper Dinos dance sing burp and do other silly tricks. Fun for the Nick Jr. Crowd!

projects.name: Zig Zag Zombie: Quirky Physics Puzzler for iPhone
projects.blurb: Last day, even though we're at 100% we still need YOUR pledge!! ;) Innovative Physics Puzzler iPhone game!

projects.name: The Light of the Darkness - The Game
projects.blurb: The Light of Darkness is a beautiful indie side-scroller game, with action/RPG/plataform elements and based on a unique universe.

projects.name: Astronaut: Moon, Mars & Beyond, The NASA MMO Online Game
projects.blurb: Astronaut: Moon, Mars and Beyond™, the official NASA MMO video game depicts the year 2035, with realistic environments and missions!

projects.name: Project Stormos
projects.blurb: Project Stormos is a hardcore, high speed platformer. Take Robo and try to dash through entire levels without ever touching the ground.

projects.name: KoLumbus 7 11/11/11
projects.blurb: KoLumbus 7 is short on funding and in danger of being cancelled. Lend a hand and get some cool stuff!

projects.name: STAR COMMAND: Sci-Fi meets GameDev Story for iOS and Android
projects.blurb: Star Command is a game for iOS and Android where players can build their own ship, recruit their crew and explore the universe.

projects.name: VENUS PATROL: charting a new course for videogame culture
projects.blurb: Venus Patrol is a new videogame website in search of beautiful things, from former Offworld.com editor and IGF Chairman Brandon Boyer.

projects.name: ZOMBIES, RUN! Running game & audio adventure for iOS/Android
projects.blurb: Rebuild civilization after a zombie apocalypse by running in the real world, with story and gameplay coming through your headphones

creator.name: Six to Start and Naomi Alderman

projects.name: Cafe Murder
projects.blurb: Serve sandwiches and protect customers from the insane chef! A restaurant simulation game like you've never seen before.

projects.name: Lifeless Planet: A New Cinematic Sci-Fi Adventure Game
projects.blurb: Intriguing story and spectacular environments in the spirit of classic adventures like ICO, The Dig, and Another World.

projects.name: Last Class Heroes - 2D Action RPG Eyecandy!
projects.blurb: Action RPG featuring stunning 2D visuals, fast paced gameplay and multiple story lines. For iOS, Android, OSX and Windows.

projects.name: The Adventures of Alphaman
projects.blurb: Save the universe in this episodic comic book arcade adventure game for iOS and Android!

projects.name: BlindSide: The Audio Adventure Video Game
projects.blurb: BlindSide is a survival/horror adventure game with no graphics at all. Navigate a 3D world using only your ears and what's between them
